snippet: The Clinton Foundation said it would limit donations from other countries, changing a policy that had been criticized as a conflict on interest and was a source of scrutiny for Hillary Rodham Clinton.
abstract: The Clinton Foundation said it would limit donations from other countries, changing a policy that had been criticized as a conflict on interest and was a source of scrutiny for Hillary Rodham Clinton.

headline.main: Clinton Foundation Revises Policy on Foreign Donations
headline.print_headline: Group Tied to Clintons Alters Policy on Donors
